task.title: Getting Started
task.shortdesc: How to download and setup BreakBuddy.

taskbody.context: These steps show you how to install and setup BreakBuddy on your device.

step.cmd: Visit the App Site for IOS or iPhone.
Search for BreakBuddy and click Install.
Open the app and follow the on-screen instructions to set up an account, once BreakBuddy is installed.
Launch BreakBuddy and create a new account.
Allow Notifications so BreakBuddy can remind you of your breaks.
